plot: A man bears witness to a crime of violence. He tries to forget what he has seen, but his conscience forces him to act.
title: In mot natten
plot_es: A man bears witness to a crime of violence. He tries to forget what he has seen, but his conscience forces him to act.
plot_en: A man bears witness to a crime of violence. He tries to forget what he has seen, but his conscience forces him to act.
